title: Zed is on sale and free this week???

replies.body: I cant wait to fight like 80 zeds this week. It's gonna be so ~~much fun~~ boring and cheap.

Time for sum AD bruiser Zed top lane lane Kappa. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
{{champion:238}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3071}} {{item:2140}}
Why is it that when the last champion I play as, or play with, they go on free rotation? :/ Oh well, time to show the f2p Zeds that hes not easy to pick up. :P
They need to move him before his crippling nerf! :P
That's OK. I didn't want to play Norms anyway.
